description: This is a Spring Security configuration class (SecurityConfig) defining security filter chain for the application. It permits access to static resources and H2 console, disables CSRF for dev, disables frame options to enable H2 console rendering, and sets a permissive authorization policy.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Defines security configuration for a Spring Boot application, including security filter chain setup.

methods.name: securityFilterChain
methods.description: Configures and returns the SecurityFilterChain bean, setting authorization, CSRF, and frame options for the application.
